department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The procurement involves the award of an advance contract for parachutes for the Department of National Defence (DND).
description: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is used to notify the selected contractors of the main contract award. The solicitation was made under the departments internal competitve sourcing using Governement of Canadiana requirments (Bizproc2)
